Name: Summoner's Respite
Story Background: In the midst of chaos, the summoner called upon the harmonious energies of nature, weaving a tranquil refuge to protect and heal their allies amidst the ravages of battle.
Ability: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 4 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Appearance Description: A lush, verdant sanctuary enveloping a group of creatures, emanating a soothing aura that shields, revives, and strengthens them. The artwork is filled with vibrant greens and soothing whites, evoking a sense of serene rejuvenation and revitalized unity.
